views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8 - 13

MoreLinesNotifications Increases the Lines for the Notifications on the LockScreen and in the Notification Center!

The Tweak is out of Stage from my Personal Repository.

No options to Configure.

See Screenshot below.

Tip thanks to sinfool.

Testing thanks to @lorenzo_noide.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.2 - Updated for iOS 13 Compatibility. - General Code Improvements and for Banners too. Version 1.0.1
- Added Code for Better Supporting iOS 12.4.
Version 1.0.0-6
- Added support for arm64e/A12. Only Tested on iOS 10-12. Older Versions Should Avoid on updating (thanks Jonas for testing).
Version 1.0.0-5
- Fixed Crashing Issue on iOS 8 occurred in the Previous Update. (Reported by a User on Mail).
Version 1.0.0-4
- Hopefully Increased the Functionality on iOS 8 (Mail Request).
Version 1.0.0-3
- Increased the Lines to See the Notifications (Twitter Request).
- Improvements.
Version 1.0.0-2
- Added the Compatibility for iOS 8 and iOS 9 (Mail Request) in the Notification Center.
